verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Lord prepare me
To be a sanctuary
Pure and holy
Tried and true
With thanksgiving
I'll be a living
Sanctuary for You

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Lord prepare us
To be a sanctuary
Pure and holy
Tried and true
With thanksgiving,
We'll be a living
Sanctuary for You
